Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Huh? Oh...welcome. Sorry, I'm just feeling a
little...dizzy, is all.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, I'm fine. I'll get over it soon. Anyway, what
can I get you?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fried rice? Gotcha. Give me just a minute...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here you go.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
...AH!! That's right! You ordered fried rice, not
curry rice! I'm so sorry. I'll go remake it for you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
No, I'm fine. Honest. It'll only be a minute.
You should go get some rest.
Can I help with anything?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, as a pro I can't close up just because I'm
feeling a little dizzy. It's almost closing time. I
can manage until then.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
N-no, I mean it. I have a reservation coming in
shortly. I can't afford to close right n--

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>--W-wait, <MYNAME>, no! Hold on!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_LOSS>I get that you're worried about me. But if you
truly care about me, please don't butt into my
work like that.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I don't mean to be rude, though. I really do
appreciate it. I'm glad you're thinking about me.
Excuse me! I'd like to place an order.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! Coming!
<PAGE>
I've got to get back to work. I'll remake your fried
rice, too, so sit tight and wait just a minute,
okay?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad for the offer, but it's not right to make
my customers do my work for me.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Ah! Coming!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Ugh... Okay. You're right. I'm only going to
cause problems for my customers in my current
state.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>I hope you don't mind, but I'll take you up on
that offer. Could you take the front of the
house?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew. That was the last customer.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks to you, I somehow managed to make it
through to closing time. I really appreciate the
help.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'll have to do you a big favor...sometime...in...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Nnngh...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Where am I?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>...?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh. I collapsed, huh? Sorry. Hope I didn't make
you worry too much.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you stay here with me the whole time?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Thank you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come to think of it...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been a long time since someone stayed by
my bedside when I got sick.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See, my parents got divorced when I was really
little.
<PAGE>
My mom brought me here to stay here with her
dad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But both Mom and Grandpa were always really
busy with work, so neither of them had the time
to sit with me when I was sick.
<PAGE>
Besides, I didn't want to bother either of them,
so I usually wouldn't even tell them how I was
feeling.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So it's been forever since I've had someone
worried enough about me to stay by my side till
I got better. It's a nice feeling.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Ah...! Sorry. I didn't mean to dump all that
personal stuff on you. Being sick seems to have
loosened my tongue, too...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, thanks for everything today. I'm sorry to
have been such a bother. I'll repay you for it
sometime, I swear!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, um...

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since I've already bugged you so much as it is,
can I ask one more little favor?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Could you, um...stay here with me a little
longer?
<PAGE>
I, uh... I'm not feeling 100% just yet.
<PAGE>
I want to rest a little more before I start getting
ready for tomorrow. If you could stay just that
long, I'd be really appreciative.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Thanks, <MYNAME>.
